message.body: The modem is next to your computer. The account info and passwords are on your keyboard along with your credit card from Ernie's and your car keys.
He didn't charge you the extra 55 dollars because I moved everything for him and put it back. But he was here for 2.5 hrs
Ok I will give you some more $
The reception at my desk seems to come and go and it is slower than I expected but I hope this is because it is new or something.
It should be at least 10 times as fast as it was
Yeah well it just stalled out twice loading a 3 min video on Vimeo
If it sucks I have 30 days to back out but I can't imagine that they replaced it with something slower. It's supposed to be 50mbps and I was getting around .5 to 3mbps before
